title: Can't get into game
body: For the times I CAN log in on mac, the screen turns completely black during loading screen and will not load the game. My mouse still moves but I can't get out of the black screen which forces me to force shut down my computer.

replies.body: There have been a few reports about this from mac players, and it may be an issue caused by a pop up notification failing to take priority.  When you get to champion select, tapping Enter on your keyboard should close out the missing pop up and load you in.  Let me know if that helps.
It worked for me just if you pressed enter, thank you! :)

Porocles,

This seems for the case for me. And it works for me, thank you for giving a possible solution that actually helps me, a Mac user, to connect to the game.
Awesome, I'm glad to hear this worked out for you!
